title: CORRUPTED ASGORE

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Send a flaming spear to your target. They will be basic attacked, but if they survive they will burn. After burning for two days, you will use another unstoppable attack. You can't be affected by abilities from a player who is burning.
- Spin your trident, gain basic defense and powerful attack all of your visitors. (2 uses)
- Steal the target's SOUL and overkill attack them. If you use this ability, you will deal an overkill attack to yourself after 1 day. (1 use)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - Everyone who will visit you will be informed you're CORRUPTED ASGORE.

desc:
Post 1407B
*I will finally avenge Asriel. Humans **will** suffer.*
